feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [LIM1][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 8, 04:00 - 07:00 UTC

Jul 21, 20:45 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 08/08/2023 04:00 UTC
End time : 08/08/2023 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - R806R16 - R806R17
entry.content:
Jul 26, 16:10 UTC
Identified - A fault in a module of the cooling system is at the root of this incident, and a corrective fix is currently being implemented.

Jul 26, 15:56 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 26/07/2023 14:50 UTC
Service impact : Servers on racks R806R16 and R806R17 are currently unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [RBX2D][Hosted Private Cloud] - Datastores Outage
entry.content:
Jul 14, 16:39 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 14/07/2023 08:20 UTC
End Time : 14/07/2023 16:38 UTC
Service impact : Several datastores on RBX2D were currently unreachable.

Jul 14, 15:03 UTC
Update - 1 server is still impacted in cluster10021. No more impact is observed on other servers.
Our teams are currently working to solve the problem.

Jul 14, 09:52 UTC
Identified - The issue is caused by a failure on a cooling module and a fix is being implemented.

Jul 14, 08:54 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 14/07/2023 08:20 UTC
User impact : Several datastores on RBX2D are currently unreachable.
Technical impact :RBX2D
Ongoing Actions: Under investigation.
